# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.x     | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability in _bs theme, please report it responsibly:

1. **Do NOT** open a public GitHub issue
2. Email the maintainer directly at your-email@example.com
3. Include detailed steps to reproduce the vulnerability
4. Allow reasonable time for a fix before public disclosure

## Security Best Practices

When using _bs theme:

- Keep WordPress core updated
- Keep all plugins updated
- Use strong passwords
- Use HTTPS on your site
- Regularly backup your site

## Scope

This security policy applies to the _bs WordPress theme code only, not to:
- WordPress core
- Third-party plugins
- Your custom modifications
- Hosting environment issues
